mapper.select: select bt.id,bt.blessing,bt.push_time, bt.poster_url,bt.state,bt.notice_text,bt.notice_poster_url from user_birthday_template bt join union_birthday_month bm on bm.template_id = bt.id where bt.state = 1 and bt.deleted = 1 and bm.`month` = #{month}

select bt.* from user_birthday_template bt join union_birthday_month bm on bm.template_id = bt.id where bt.state = 1 and deleted = 1 and bt.type = #{type} AND bm.`month` = #{month} and DATE_FORMAT(bt.push_time, '%H:%i') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time},'%H:%i') limit 1
select bt.*, GROUP_CONCAT(bm.`month` order by bm.`month` asc) as month_text from user_birthday_template bt left join union_birthday_month bm on bm.template_id = bt.id where bt.id = #{templateId}
